titleStmt.title: Rules, orders, and directions by the lord lieutenant and council
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1672-1677 : Essex)
Essex, Arthur Capel, Earl of, 1631-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Joseph Wilde ...,

notesStmt.note: "... for the better regulating the corporation of the town of Gallway ..."-- P. 3.
"Given at the Council-chamber in Dublin, the three and twentieth day of September, 1672."-- P. 12.
Errors in paging: p. 8 misnumbered 14, p. 10-11 misnumbered 13-14.
Item at reel 1643:5 identified as Wing R2265 Variant b (number cancelled).
Reproductions of originals in the Harvard University Library and Marsh's Library, St. Patrick's, Dublin.
